items.question: The equivalent passive construction of the active sentence, "A thief stole the painting" is:

choices.text: The painting is stolen by a thief.
It was the thief who stole the painting.
The painting was stolen by a thief.
It was a painting that the thief stole.

items.question: Which sentence has a gerund?
Which of the following sentences illustrates faulty use of preposition?

choices.text: She came just ON time for the party.
She shares her problems TO her friends.
